title: Practo - Consult Doctors Online & Book Appointment
description:
Practo is more than just an app for
booking online doctor appointments
. It is a one-stop shop for all your medical needs where you can:
- Book doctor appointments
-
Consult & chat with a doctor online 24x7
- Buy affordable
family health plans
- Maintain
digital health records
- Read free &
regular health tips
- India Health Hour Daily 5 pm to 6pm - Consult top doctors online Free, Daily
One can also ask free health questions and receive regular health tips and health advice from verified specialists on Practo. With 2 lakh+ healthcare providers from best clinics & top hospitals across cities like Mumbai, Bangalore, Surat, Noida, Jaipur, Lucknow, Chennai, New Delhi, Pune & 30+ other cities, you can seamlessly:
🔅Find the right doctor closest to you; view feedback,
doctor’s online profile
& consultation fees; & book Dr appointments
🔅Online doctor consultation of experienced doctors from
top hospitals in India
🔅Consult or Video Chat doctor online anywhere; connect within 2 minutes
🔅
Chat privately with specialists
—Dentists, Dermatologists, Gynaecologists, ENT specialist, General physicians, Urologists, Ophthalmologists, Paediatricians, Oncologists, Psychologists, Gastroenterologists & more
🔅Access all your digital health records in one place, and read expert-written health tips & articles for free
Find the right doctor for you & your loved ones
Tired of searching for the right doctor to go to? Fret no more! Practo offers an expansive list of 80,000+ trusted docs & surgeons to choose from.
🔎 Find doctors/medical specialists in your area by name, speciality, or clinical procedure
👍🏽 👎🏽 View doctor reviews, doctor’s online profile, locations, fees & experiences
👩🏽‍⚕️ Enjoy hassle-free online doctor appointment booking
Online doctor consultations 24x7 - No waiting in queues & No rushing for doctor appointments!
Too sick to go see a doctor in person? Need to consult a doctor immediately? With Practo, an
online doctors consult app
, you don’t have to travel anymore! You can ask a doctor about your health concerns over a private call or chat.
*Consult a doctor online via secured chat or call
*Connect with the best doctor in just 2 minutes
* 100% safe and secure
*Do a free follow-up chat with the doctor in the next three days
You can get started with just four simple steps:
1. Enter your symptoms 🤧🤒
2. Select a specialist 👨‍⚕️ & pay 💳 online
3. Wait 2 minutes ⏱ to connect to the best doctor
4. Consult via chat or video call
Consult doctor for various symptoms across 169+ specialities.
Gynaecology
Menstrual disorders
Erratic/ painful/ heavy periods
PCOD/PCOS
Vaginal dryness/ Vaginal discharge
Breast infection/ problems
Dermatology
Acne treatment
Fungal skin infections
Hair loss treatment
Skin rashes
Pediatrics
Childhood nutrition
Infections & injuries
Common cold/ Cough/ Fever
Stomach issues
Growth & development concerns
Download this online doctor appointment and doctor consultation app right away, & join our healthy community!
We’d love to hear from you. Drop us a line at support@practo.com
You can find us on: www.practo.com; https://www.facebook.com/practo/,
https://www.twitter.com/Practo
Book appointments for diabetes, cancer, weight loss, hair fall, ENT problems & more. Practo offers consultation for 160+ specialities including Psychology, Physiotherapy, Gynaecology, Dermatology, Gastroenterology, Dentistry, Orthopaedics, Ayurveda & Homeopathy.
